name: iPhone 11
description: The iPhone 11 features a dual-camera system, A13 Bionic chip, and a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display. It also has Face ID and is water and dust resistant.

name: Samsung Galaxy S20
description: The Samsung Galaxy S20 features a 64 MP camera, 5G capabilities, and a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. It also has a long-lasting battery and an in-display fingerprint sensor.

name: Google Pixel 4
description: The Google Pixel 4 features a dual-camera system, Google Assistant, and a 5.7-inch OLED display. It also has a fast charging battery and facial recognition technology.

name: OnePlus 7T
description: The OnePlus 7T features a triple-camera system, a 90 Hz Fluid AMOLED display, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 855 Plus processor. It also has Warp Charge 30T technology and an in-display fingerprint sensor.

name: LG V60
description: The LG V60 features a triple-camera system, a 6.8-inch P-OLED display, and a 5,000 mAh battery. It also has 5G capabilities and a fingerprint sensor.

name: Sony Xperia 1 II
description: The Sony Xperia 1 II features a triple-camera system, a 6.5-inch OLED display, and a 4,000 mAh battery. It also has 5G capabilities and a fingerprint sensor.

name: Motorola Moto G Power
description: The Motorola Moto G Power features a triple-camera system, a 6.4-inch HD+ display, and a 5,000 mAh battery. It also has a fingerprint sensor and is available in multiple colors.

name: Nokia 5.4
description: The Nokia 5.4 features a quad-camera system, a 6.39-inch HD+ display, and a 4,000 mAh battery. It also has a fingerprint sensor and is available in multiple colors.
